artist: Artist: Trina Robbins , et al.; Publisher: Secession, Vienna
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, phtotomechanical illustration of six-armed figure surrounded by various objects, with text, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 40 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: She Draws Comics
